gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This data set covers 20 gauges in 17 unique Arctic Ocean drainage basins in the Russian pan-Arctic (ART-Russia). Warm season 10-day time step data (decades) were collected from Russian archival sources covering a period from 1929 to 2003 with most data falling in the range from the mid-1930s to the early 1990s. The water temperature data was combined with river discharge data to estimate energy flux for all basins and over the Russian pan-Arctic as a whole.
